entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18 except minus 7 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 except minus 7 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13 except minus 4 over southern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13 except minus 4 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
